attributes.value: Sees guile and cunning as indirect and somewhat worthless
Is greatly disturbed by quiet and a peaceful existence
Values a harmonious existence
Really respects those that take the time to master a skill
Values hard work
Finds the pursuit of knowledge to be a waste of effort
Very rarely develops negative feelings toward things
Often feels envious of others
Feels best when everyone gets along without any strife or contention
Relies on the advice of others during decision making
Does not feel the slightest need to reciprocate favors that others do for her, no matter how major the help or how much she needed it
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Easily changes her mind and will generally go with the prevailing view on anything
Feels helping others is an imposition on her time
Tries to keep her things orderly
Weak
Quick to heal
Meager creativity
Very good intuition
A questionable spatial sense
Next to no empathy
